author: Erin Schumaker
title: How did the US come up so short on PPE?
description: Despite years of warnings, when COVID-19 spread in the U.S., doctors and nurses found themselves without enough personal protection equipment to treat patients safely.
content: Despite years of public health experts warning that the United States was not prepared to handle a respiratory virus pandemic, when COVID-19 spread in the U.S., doctors and nurses found themselves without enough personal protection equipment, or PPE, to treat… [+2149 chars]
